column5: Spacious 2400sqft. 3 Bedroom 3 1/2 Bath Townhome on the Island with a private pool. All bedrooms have their own full bath for a more comfortable stay for everyone. Our home also has a full kitchen and an open floor concept in the living and dining area for great gatherings. Another great thing is that you're only walking distance to Beach, restaurant and entertainment. Can you just smell the ocean breeze already? Hope we can serve you for your next vacation stay.   Permit ID # 2015-XSPULD
column8: 3 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE ON SOUTH PADRE ISLAND , TEXAS
